description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Google Cloud Platform v2 -  (Grafana 8.x / InfluxDB v2.x)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Policies")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Repositories")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "VMs")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "VMsProtected")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Policies")
  |> group(columns: ["version"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.description:
On this Map, you can quickly know which VMs are not Protected by Veeam Backup for GCP. 
With a simple, yet powerful view, you can understand and try to mitigate the red spots.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_vm_unprotected")
  |> keep(columns: ["VMName","geohash","VMRegion"])
  |> distinct(column: "VMName")
  |> group(columns: ["geohash","VMRegion"])
  |> count()

panels.title: Unprotected VMs

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_overview")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "VMsProtected")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_vm_unprotected")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "TotalVMs")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly know how much time did a Backup, or Snapshot Policy take. You can quickly filter by Policy Name on the top menu.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sessionDuration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sessionType"] =~ /${PolicyType:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sessionPolicyName"] =~ /${PolicyName:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["sessionPolicyName","sessionType"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Job Duration

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_sessions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sessionStatus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sessionType"] =~ /${PolicyType:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sessionPolicyName"] =~ /${PolicyName:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["sessionPolicyName","sessionType"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly know which VMs are Protected by Veeam Backup for GCP. With all the needed details as VM Name, Instance Type, GCP Region, etc..

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_vm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RestorePoints")
  |> group(columns: ["VMName","VMRegion","VMType"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Protected VMs

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly know which VMs are not Protected by Veeam Backup for GCP. With all the needed details as VM Name, GCP Region, and GCP Instance Type.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_vm_unprotected")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "RestorePoints")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["VMName"] =~ /${VMName:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["VMName","VMRegion","VMType"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Unprotected VMs

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly see all your Backup Repositories, with name, type, etc.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_repositories")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "repoEncryption")
  |> group(columns: ["repoAccountName","repoContainer","repoDescription","repoName","RepositoryTier"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Backup Repositories

panels.description: On this Panel, you can quickly see your different Policies, the retention, if it has application-aware enabled, etc.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_policies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PolicySnapshotCountDaily")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["PolicyName"] =~ /${PolicyName:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["PolicyName","_field"])
  |> last()

panels.title: Protection Policies

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_sessions")
  |> keep(columns: ["sessionPolicyName"])
  |> distinct(column: "sessionPolicyName")
  |> group()
list.label: Policy Name
list.name: PolicyName
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_sessions")
  |> keep(columns: ["sessionPolicyName"])
  |> distinct(column: "sessionPolicyName")
  |> group()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "veeam_gcp_vm_unprotected")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["VMName"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["VMName"])
  |> distinct(column: "VMName")
  |> group()
list.label: Unprotected VM
list.name: VMName
